name: Space duck
description:
A small game about a hussite space duck, stuck in a single level with increasing difficulty. 

There are 4 base levels plus one secret level.

The goal is to get to the big exit door at the end of the level.

Controls: Left and right arrow keys for movement, spacebar to jump.

TIPS

These are good and tasty crabs. Eat them to increase your score. 

These crabs are pretty dangerous. They can kill you in one hit. Jump onto them to kill them and increase your score.

The spining scythe kills you only if it hits you with it´s blade. Touching the hilt is save.

Details
Game made for Ludum Dare 47 jam. 

Made by me and MikadoH/Poniczech

All art, sounds and music are our own work.

Music samples:

  • Charles Aznavour - Parce Que Tu Crois
  • The Winstons - Amen, Brother
  • Eminem - The Real Slim Shady
  • Wu-Tang Clan - C.R.E.A.M.
  • Alice Longyu Gao - Rich Bitch Juice

Made in GDevelop. 

Info about hussites: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hussite_Wars

Want source code? Here: https://github.com/VladimirBlazek/Loop_game
